column1: Local Foods////My first take was that Local Foods is very much a deconstructed Ruggles Green. The food screams overpriced (roughly $10 for a sandwich and two sides) yet fitting with the "conscious eater" concept (healthy
column4: et cetera and so forth). Unlike Ruggles
column5: which has a positively overwhelming menu
column6: Local Foods sticks to a very business-like soup
column8: sandwich menu. The space is much more wide open and industrial-like when compared to the crowded
